name: punishes
description: Punish data from SLP replay files - sequences of connected moves

columns.name: start_frame
columns.comment: First frame of punish (0 == internal frame -123)

columns.name: end_frame
columns.comment: Last frame of punish (0 == internal frame -123)

columns.name: start_pct
columns.comment: Opponent's damage on first frame of punish

columns.name: end_pct
columns.comment: Opponent's damage on last frame of punish

columns.name: stocks
columns.comment: Opponent's stocks on first frame of punish

columns.name: num_moves
columns.comment: Number of moves (hitboxes connected) in the current punish

columns.name: last_move_id
columns.comment: ID of the last move that hit

columns.name: kill_dir
columns.comment: Direction of kill, as specified in Dir enum (-1 = didn't kill)
